item.title: Nimverta Secures Venture Kick Support to Advance Bone Regeneration Therapy
item.description: Nimverta, a Zurich-based biotech startup, has secured CHF 10,000 in funding from Venture Kick, entering a new phase in its journey to develop first-in-class peptide therapies for bone regeneration. The support is part of Venture Kickâ€™s Stage I, designed to catalyze high-potential Swiss startups.
